product.name: Lusper Weight Bench for Home Gym, Adjustable and Foldable 700LB/800LB Weight Bench, Multi-Purpose Workout Bench for Bench Press Sit up Incline Flat Decline
product.description: 700lb True Capacity for Improved Security: Feel your training rock solid with the upgraded steel and pro triangle structure. Professionally load tested, the bench boasts spectacular weight 700lb max to make your safe and focused while lifting. Fully Adjustable, Incredibly Versatile: Get your best full body muscle pump with this 3 in 1 bench (with the cost of only 1!), and tap your body’s full potential using it as a workout bench, flat bench, supine board, and bench press stool all in 1! 3-Sec Fold, Space Saving: Store the weight bench anywhere you like in any small space! Can be easily stashed away under the couch/bed, in the corner/cabinet or trunk. Easy storage, easy transport. Effortless Assembly: Your life is made so much easier with the bench coming 95% already assembled. Setting up the rest is a no brainer, so that you can jump right into your favorite workout ASAP! Pro Workout Guide for the Perfect Physique: Get ready to reach your full potential and top workout performance faster with our pro workout guide and instructional video! Save big bucks on personal trainers and save your energy and time on exhausting trips to and from the gym.
product.bullet_points:
• Heavy-Duty Durability: Our product stands strong with a heavy-duty 5x5cm, 1.2mm thick steel frame. Tested to support 800 pounds at multiple points, it's the reliable, safe choice
• Innovative Design Ensures Unrivaled Stability: Our product boasts a professionally extended bullhorn leg, standing out from through-axle norms. Its groundbreaking non-through-axle design preserves steel integrity, delivering remarkable stability & performance
• Precise Angle Adjustment: Enjoy unparalleled precision with our dual-notch scale indicators. The deepened slots ensure maximum stability and safety, making angle adjustments effortless and accurate
• Effortless Fold & Setup: Sturdy yet ultra-convenient, fold in a flash within 5 seconds and assemble in just 5 minutes
• Ultimate Comfort: Engineered to IPF standards, this training bench boasts a 17.7" seat height and an 11.8" pad width. Plus, the extra-thick 2.16" padded cushion ensures a soft and cozy experience
• Satisfactory Service: Feel free to reach us for any problems you encounter, especially those arising from long distance transport. We’ll guarantee you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours, with a heartfelt smile
